faqs.title: Can I use only one KPI application or do I need to use all of them?
faqs.text: Yes, KPI applications work in harmony, and the best results are achieved when used together. However, if you only want to use one application, you can choose the one you need. Our sales team is ready to advise which applications are most suitable for your business.

faqs.title: How to ensure applications work together?
faqs.text: All KPI applications are integrated with each other, so when used together, your business processes become more efficient. Our team will help you with integration and setup.

faqs.title: Can I test the KPI application?
faqs.text: Yes, you can use the application during the free trial period. This allows you to test all features and evaluate their suitability for your business.

faqs.title: How does customer support work?
faqs.text: Through the platform, you can easily communicate with your customers. Our team is always ready to help with questions, complaints, and consultations.

faqs.title: Is there an ability to manage orders and sales processes?
faqs.text: Yes, you can track all orders, sales, and calculations on one platform. This will help you effectively manage your business.
